  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83364</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83364</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Détecter le rayonnement avec le compteur  Geiger</string>
            <string language="en">Detecting radiation by Geiger counter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdecken von von Strahlung durch Geigerzähler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detectando a radiação pelo contador de Geiger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rilevazione della radiazione dal contatore di 
geiger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανίχνευση της ακτινοβολίας από geiger το μετρητή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Detección de la radiación por el contador de 
geiger</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment un compteur Geiger fonctionne en démontrant ce qui se produit à l'intérieur d'un tube Geiger-Muller quand le rayonnement frappe  des molécules de gaz à l'intérieur du tube.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a Geiger counter works by demonstrating what happens inside a Geiger-Muller tube when radiation hits gas molecules inside the tube.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">frais électriques</string>
            <string language="en">electric charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">molécules de gaz</string>
            <string language="en">gas molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">compteur Geiger</string>
            <string language="en">Geiger Counter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tube Geiger-Muller</string>
            <string language="en">Geiger-Muller tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Geigerzähler 
arbeitet, indem er demonstriert, was innerhalb eines 
Geiger-Geiger-Mullergefäßes geschieht, wenn Strahlung Gasmoleküle 
innerhalb des Gefäßes schlägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um contador de 
Geiger trabalha demonstrando o que acontece dentro de um tubo do 
Geiger-geiger-Muller quando a radiação bate moléculas do gás 
dentro do tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un contatore di 
geiger funziona dimostrando che cosa accade all'interno di un tubo del
Geiger-geiger-Muller quando la radiazione colpisce le molecole del gas
all'interno del tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς geiger αντίθετος
εργάζεται με την επίδειξη τι συμβαίνει μέσα σε έναν σωλήνα 
γεηγερ-τροχών όταν χτυπά αέριο η ακτινοβολία τα μόρια μέσα 
στο σωλήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un contador de 
geiger trabaja demostrando lo que sucede dentro de un tubo de la 
Geiger-Moleta cuando la radiación golpea las moléculas del gas 
dentro del tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasmoleküle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geigerzähler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geiger-Geiger-Mullergefäß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cargas elétricas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moléculas do gás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Contador De Geiger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tubo do Geiger-geiger-Muller</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cariche elettriche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecole del gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Contatore Di Geiger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tubo del Geiger-geiger-Muller</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικές δαπάνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέριο μόρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Geiger μετρητής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεηγερ-τροχός σωλήνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cargas eléctricas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">moléculas del gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contador De Geiger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tubo de la Geiger-Moleta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación</string>
          </keyword>
